title: peTruyya vENum
sahitya:
peTruyya vENum ayyE veTri vElA un aruLai


anupallavi

  uTriDum iDarellAm Odi maraindiDavE ulaginil kavalaiyaTra nilaiyAna nirai vAzhvai


caraNam    naTruNaikku undan porppadam adaip-pOTri paTrip-paNindadum en pAzh vinaiyaip-pOkka
peTra tAyinaippOl nI shaTrumE salippurAdu vaTrAda parivuDanE vazhangum varam adanai
